title: How can I update my mobile number for my GCredit account?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

## Promoted articles

- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To update your GCash registered number with GCredit, make sure your new number is **[fully verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account#h_01FPYEDSZ597DXA7JF5NWD6PBC)** then [click here to ask for help](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gcredit__i_lost_my_old_number_and_i_want_to_replace_it_with_my_new_kyc_d_number.). A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours**.

Please wait for **24 hours** for your new details to reflect in your GCredit account.
